mapper.select: SELECT U_OZNL.CreateDate, /*创建时间*/ U_ZNL1.Brand, /*品牌*/ U_ZNL1.ItemName, /*型号*/ U_ZNL1.Series, /*价值排名*/ U_ZNL1.SEOQty, /*搜索次数（30天内）*/ U_ZNL1.SEOCompany, /*搜索公司（30天内）*/ U_ZNL1.PriceQty, /*云价格条数（30天内）*/ U_ZNL1.PriceCompany, /*云价格记录（30天内）*/ U_ZNL1.OnHandQty, /*现货家数*/ U_ZNL1.OnHand /*现货库存*/ FROM U_ZNL1 LEFT JOIN U_OZNL ON U_OZNL.DocEntry = U_ZNL1.DocEntry WHERE U_ZNL1.ItemName IN (SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN (SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle})) ORDER BY U_OZNL.CreateDate DESC
